name: nextjs
description: For this project, we are going to be using [create-next-app](https://nextjs.org/docs/api-reference/create-next-app) to generate a [Next.js](https://nextjs.org) app that uses [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org).

scripts.build: npm run stop && npm run destroy && npm run start:clean
scripts.destroy:global: docker system prune -f --volumes && docker image prune -a -f
